Configuration.Name: L1=L2=20m_central
Configuration.SetupScript:
sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/setspeed 25476') sics.execute('hset /instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength 5.02')
#config.wavelength = 5 config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 config.det = 19250 config.det_offset = 0 config.srce = 150 config.guide = 'ga' config.apx = -98 config.bs = 2 config.beamcenterx = 97.4231 config.beamcenterz = 96.155 config.drive()
